Title: Enacts the climate resilient New York act of 2025; establishes the office of resilience to assess and identify climate related threats
Summary: Enacts the climate resilient New York act; establishes the office of resilience and a resilience task force to assess and identify climate related threats and develop a statewide resilience plan.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to enacting the climate resilient New York act of 2025
